usePlan.description: OPTIONAL. When a static API key is specified in the rule, but an API key in the request does not have an associated rate plan, this rate plan is used instead as a 'default'.

id.description: The immutable identifier of the associated rate plan. EITHER id or slug is required, but not both.

slug.description: The url-safe name of the associated rate plan. EITHER id or slug is required, but not both.

title: ErrorRuleDefinitionDto
description: Defines error handling for a static API key rule when the API key in the request isn't found (is not predefined).
